intro: Psychotria ovalis, commonly known as the "Crimson Glory" or "Red Psychotria," is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its dark green, oval-shaped leaves and clusters of small, red or orange flowers that bloom throughout the year. Psychotria ovalis is often found in lowland rainforests and is adapted to nutrient-poor soils. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for horticultural cultivation in warm climates.
